FuncDef:
The trust upstream vxlan-mode command configures VXLAN-DSCP-based BA classification to map VXLAN DSCP values of packets to internal priorities.
The undo trust upstream vxlan-mode command cancels VXLAN-DSCP-based BA classification.
By default, VXLAN-DSCP-based BA classification is not configured.
ParentView: VPN instance IPv4 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a DS domain.
The value is a string of 1 to 48 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When packets are forwarded out of a VXLAN tunnel, to inherit the packets' priorities in the VXLAN tunnel, run the trust upstream inbound vxlan-mode command.
After the trust upstream inbound vxlan-mode command is run, the system maps VXLAN DSCP values of packets to internal priorities.
Prerequisites
The DS domain and VXLAN have been configured.
